messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] garbage trucks and just chat was Swimming and  other observations
messages.msgSnippet: This is so cool! My almost-2-yr-old loves garbage trucks too! (But not so much so that I think she wants to go to the landfill--uck!) OTOH, we could park
messages.messageBody:
This is so cool! My almost-2-yr-old loves garbage trucks too! (But not so much so
that I think she wants to go to the landfill--uck!) OTOH, we could park outside
the entrance and watch the trucks come and go--hm...this is sounding pretty good
after all! Where's the landfill?

I ran into a person named Dawn at the park meeting today, but it wasn't you...I
thought I met you once last year, but now I think I just had you pointed out or
something.

:-) Diane

NumoAstro@... wrote:

> My 2 year old loves garbage trucks so next week we are taking a trip to the
> landfill (I'm keeping my windows rolled up LOL) Not only did this not cost
> me anything I knew Max will absolutely love it.
